no.uib.triogen.io.genotypes

Interface GenotypesProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VcfLine, VcfVariant

    public interface GenotypesProvider
    The GenotypesProvider provides the genotypes for a given variant.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double checkMendelianErrors(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
      Checks the prevalence of Mendelian errors.If more than 50%, switch the children alleles.
      void emptyGenotypeDosageCaches()
      Empty the caches for genotypes and dosages.
      boolean genotyped()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether the marker is genotyped.
      String getAlt()
      Returns the alternative allele of the variant.
      int getBp()
      Returns the bp of the variant.
      String getContig()
      Returns the contig of the variant.
      float[] getDosages(String sampleId)
      Returns the dosages for the given sample as an array [p0, p1, p2].
      String getDosagesAsString(String sampleId, String separator)
      Returns the dosages for the given sample as a string.
      short getGenotype(String sampleId)
      Returns the hard-called genotype for a given sample.
      short getNAlt(String sampleId)
      Returns the number of alternative alleles using hard calls.
      double getNAltDosages(String sampleId)
      Returns the number of alternative alleles using dosages.
      short[] getNAltH(String childId, String motherId, String fatherId)
      Returns the number of alternative alleles for each h of a trio according to the nomenclature of Chen et al.
      double getParentsDosageP0Cache()
      Returns the sum of p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
      float[] getParentsDosageP0sCache()
      Returns the p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
      int getParentsGenotypeP0Cache()
      Returns the sum of p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
      boolean[] getParentsGenotypeP0sCache()
      Returns the p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
      String getRef()
      Returns the reference allele of the variant.
      String getVariantID()
      Returns the id of the variant.
      void parse(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
      Parses the genotypes.
      void setParentP0s(String[] childIds, ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
      Sets the p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
      void swapChildAlleles(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
      Swaps child alleles.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        void parse(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
        Parses the genotypes.
        Parameters:
        childToParentMap - The child to parent map to use.

      • getGenotype

        short getGenotype(String sampleId)
        Returns the hard-called genotype for a given sample. 0: 0|0 1: 1|0 2: 0|1 3: 1|1
        Parameters:
        sampleId - The id of the sample.
        Returns:
        The hard-called genotype.

      • getNAlt

        short getNAlt(String sampleId)
        Returns the number of alternative alleles using hard calls.
        Parameters:
        sampleId - The id of the sample.
        Returns:
        The hard-called number of alternative alleles.

      • getDosages

        float[] getDosages(String sampleId)
        Returns the dosages for the given sample as an array [p0, p1, p2].
        Parameters:
        sampleId - The id of the sample.
        Returns:
        The dosages.

      • getDosagesAsString

        String getDosagesAsString(String sampleId,
                          String separator)
        Returns the dosages for the given sample as a string.
        Parameters:
        sampleId - The id of the sample.
        separator - The separator to use.
        Returns:
        The dosages.

      • getNAltDosages

        double getNAltDosages(String sampleId)
        Returns the number of alternative alleles using dosages.
        Parameters:
        sampleId - The id of the sample.
        Returns:
        The number of alternative alleles using dosages.

      • getNAltH

        short[] getNAltH(String childId,
                 String motherId,
                 String fatherId)
        Returns the number of alternative alleles for each h of a trio according to the nomenclature of Chen et al. (https://doi.org/10.1101/737106) as an array [h1, h2, h3, h4].
        Parameters:
        childId - The id of the child.
        motherId - The id of the mother.
        fatherId - The id of the father.
        Returns:
        An array containing the number of alternative alleles.

      • getVariantID

        String getVariantID()
        Returns the id of the variant.
        Returns:
        the id of the variant

        String getContig()
        Returns the contig of the variant.
        Returns:

        Returns the bp of the variant.
        Returns:
        the bp of the variant

      • getRef

        String getRef()
        Returns the reference allele of the variant.
        Returns:
        the reference allele of the variant

      • getAlt

        String getAlt()
        Returns the alternative allele of the variant.
        Returns:

      • genotyped

        boolean genotyped()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the marker is genotyped.

      • setParentP0s

        void setParentP0s(String[] childIds,
                  ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
        Sets the p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
        Parameters:
        childIds - The ids of the children.
        childToParentMap - The child to parent map.

      • getParentsDosageP0sCache

        float[] getParentsDosageP0sCache()
        Returns the p0s for all parents of the given child ids. Mothers first and then fathers, in the order of the child ids.
        Returns:
        The p0s in an array.

      • getParentsDosageP0Cache

        double getParentsDosageP0Cache()
        Returns the sum of p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
        Returns:
        The sum of p0s.

      • getParentsGenotypeP0sCache

        boolean[] getParentsGenotypeP0sCache()
        Returns the p0s for all parents of the given child ids. Mothers first and then fathers, in the order of the child ids.
        Returns:
        The p0s in an array.

      • getParentsGenotypeP0Cache

        int getParentsGenotypeP0Cache()
        Returns the sum of p0s for all parents of the given child ids.
        Returns:
        The sum of p0s.

      • emptyGenotypeDosageCaches

        void emptyGenotypeDosageCaches()
        Empty the caches for genotypes and dosages.

      • checkMendelianErrors

        double checkMendelianErrors(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
        Checks the prevalence of Mendelian errors.If more than 50%, switch the children alleles.
        Parameters:
        childToParentMap - The child to parent map to use.
        Returns:
        The estimated prevalence of Mendelian errors.

      • swapChildAlleles

        void swapChildAlleles(ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
        Swaps child alleles.
        Parameters:
        childToParentMap - The child to parent map to use.
